thread.section_title: Wilson Amplifiers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wilson Amplifiers | wilsonamplifiers.com
thread.title: Gary Sneed
thread.title_full: Wilson Amplifiers reviewed by Gary Sneed

author: Gary Sneed
title: Gary Sneed
text: I have found Wilson to be very customer focused. It begins with them wanting to understand your expectations and needs and then making recommendations for products that best meet your needs. I felt they honestly represented their product's ability to match your needs or desire. They shipped very promptly and the packaging was very good. Very satisfied in every aspect.
